sentences.en: A: We should be delighted if you were able to join us for our housewarming party.
sentences.cn: 如果您能来参加我们的乔迁宴,我们会很高兴.

sentences.en: For your housewarming gift , I got you a baby chick and a baby duck.
sentences.cn: 作为乔迁礼, 送给你们一只小鸡一只小鸭!

sentences.en: I'm so sorry I missed the housewarming.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉我没有赶上乔迁聚会。

sentences.en: In early spring the king's house was finished and he decided to hold a housewarming party.
sentences.cn: 初春时,国王的房子已经完工.他决定举行一场宴会,以庆祝乔迁之喜.

sentences.en: Is all of life a tepid housewarming?
sentences.cn: 生活的全部是不是只是迁入新居?

sentences.en: We were really living it up at John's housewarming party last night.
sentences.cn: 在昨晚庆祝约翰乔迁之喜的晚会上,我们玩得很痛快.

trans.tran_en: A housewarming is a party that you give for friends when you have just moved to a new house
